title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to Worlds oceans - Temperature, salinity and density â equation of state â Oceans heat budget. Fluid motion in a rotating system - basic equations - analytical descriptions applied to oceanic fluid motion - force balance in oceanography. Dynamic processes and general circulation - various mathematical models for ocean circulation - dynamics of upper ocean surface waves, tides and sea level - generation of waves by wind - various theories internal waves - wind driven and thermohaline circulation - oceanic boundary layers - near shore circulation â diffusion and turbulence - effect of bottom topography and lateral boundaries.
